TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理和事件，以实现中的虚拟模式控件。Handle the and events to implement virtual mode in the control. 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件将更新和新条目存储在数据存储对象。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

Public Sub New (columnIndex As Integer, rowIndex As Integer)

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 列的索引，该列包含发生此事件的单元格。

span.span: The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.

param.name: rowIndex
param.span: 行的索引，该行包含发生此事件的单元格。

span.span: The index of the row containing the cell that the event occurs for.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnIndex As Integer
public: property int ColumnIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，此值指示发生此事件的单元格的列索引。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the column index of the cell that the event occurs for.

value.span: 列的索引，该列包含发生此事件的单元格。

span.span: The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此偏移量属性来引用的单元格，发生此事件。Use this offset with the property to reference the cell that the event occurs for. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以从数据存储区检索单元格的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve cell values from the data store. 此示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#120)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowIndex As Integer
public: property int RowIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，此值指示发生此事件的单元格的行索引。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the row index of the cell that the event occurs for.

value.span: 行的索引，该行包含发生此事件的单元格。

span.span: The index of the row containing the cell that the event occurs for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此偏移量属性来引用的单元格，发生此事件。Use this offset with the property to reference the cell that the event occurs for. ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件将更新和新条目存储在数据存储对象。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置发生此事件的单元格的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the cell that the event occurs for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查该单元格的值时处理事件，或进行通信单元格的当前值，如果创建一个事件，请使用此属性。Use this property to inspect the cell's value when handling an event, or to communicate the cell's current value if creating an event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件将更新和新条目存储在数据存储对象。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]
